p: Infodemiology metrics and approaches are an integral part of health informatics, with the most popular sources being Twitter and Google [ 19, 20], which have been successfully employed in the past to track and forecast outbreaks and epidemics (eg, Middle East respiratory syndrome [ 21], measles [ 22, 23], Ebola [ 24, 25], the swine flu [ 26], and the Zika epidemic [ 27, 28]).
